|brand = Targus |model = ACH82EU |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/24/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Targus ACH82EU |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |series = <!-- Device series -->

|vendor_id = 1a40 |device_id = 0201 |vendor_id2 = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id2 = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number -->
|controller_num = <!-- Number of controllers --> |chip1 = Terminus Technology;FE2.1; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|pwr_optional = true |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|ports = 7 |1394ports = |tt = multi |power_led = none |port_led = |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |addlchips =

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "HU2770E1 VER:1.0" is silkscreened on the board. :There are 7 (47 microfarad, 16V) '''S.I.''' capacitors on the board.
The port labels and overall shape/appearance/form_factor are quite similar to the [[SMC SMCUSBH7]] and [[Dynex DX-UH227]] - two other '''Good Way''' manufactured hubs.
==Links of Interest== :[http://cdn.targus.com/web/uk/downloads/ach82eu_user_guide.pdf User Guide]
[http://www.amazon.co.uk/Targus-Desktop-7-Port-USB-Adapter/dp/B000LRZN54 On Amazon.co.uk] :ASIN: B000LRZN54
